mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupinfo (ratioid, class, email, name, phone, deparmentid, managerid) VALUES (#{ratioid}, #{classes}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{departmentid}, #{managerid})
INSERT INTO pjhistorys (projectid, projectname, EVALUATEDID, startdate, enddate) VALUES (#{projectid}, #{projectname}, #{evaluatedid}, #{startdate}, #{enddate})
